reviewText: This is the best instructional video on any subject.  It is well organized with great camera work, lighting and sound.  Many of the demonstrations are shown from multiple points of view.  Terry covers the safety issues very well.  You should be able to spin metal after seeing this video.
Terry is a great teacher and with the handfull of metalspinners left in the US, this DVD is a must-have for anyone interested in learning the art of metalspinning.
